title: Femme en rouge dans un paysage (Woman in Red in a Landscape), from "Paysages" (Landscapes)
description: sketchy image in red, green and purple; sketchy figure in red at L center; purple and green foliage at R; trees with red flowers or fruits behind figure
creditline: Gift of funds from the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council
